
Version 1.1.0

================  =================  ==========  =======================================
HDU Name          Obj Type           Array Type  Description           
================  =================  ==========  =======================================
``ALIGNFRAME``    ndarray            floating    Main data image
``TRACES``        ndarray            floating    traces with shape [nspec,nalign,nslits]
``SPAT_ID``       ndarray            integer     Slit spatial ID
